verses.verse: וְיִפְתָּ֣ח <WH3316> Now Jephthah הַגִּלְעָדִ֗י <WH1569> the Gileadite הָיָה֙ <WH1961> become גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> was a mighty man חַ֔יִל <WH2428> of valour וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he בֶּן־ <WH1121> and he [was] the son אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> ess זוֹנָ֑ה <WH2181> commit fornication וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> begat גִּלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> and Gilead אֶת־ <WH853> יִפְתָּֽח׃ <WH3316> Jephthah

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <WH3205> bare אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife גִּלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> And Gilead's ל֖וֹ בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> him sons וַיִּגְדְּל֨וּ <WH1431> grew up בְֽנֵי־ <WH1121> sons הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> and his wife's וַיְגָרְשׁ֣וּ <WH1644> and they thrust out אֶת־ <WH853> יִפְתָּ֗ח <WH3316> Jephthah וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> and said לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִנְחַ֣ל <WH5157> unto him Thou shalt not inherit בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> in our father's כִּ֛י <WH3588> for בֶּן־ <WH1121> for thou [art] the son אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman אַחֶ֖רֶת <WH312> of a strange אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <WH1272> fled יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> Then Jephthah מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> his brethren וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land ט֑וֹב <WH2897> of Tob וַיִּֽתְלַקְּט֤וּ <WH3950> and there were gathered אֶל־ <WH413> about יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> to Jephthah אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> men רֵיקִ֔ים <WH7386> vain וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <WH3318> and went out עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with פ

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came מִיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> And it came to pass in process of time וַיִּלָּחֲמ֥וּ <WH3898> made war בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> that the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon עִם־ <WH5973> against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נִלְחֲמ֥וּ <WH3898> made war בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And it was so that when the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon עִם־ <WH5973> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead לָקַ֥חַת <WH3947> to fetch אֶת־ <WH853> יִפְתָּ֖ח <WH3316> Jephthah מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land טֽוֹב׃ <WH2897> of Tob

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said לְיִפְתָּ֔ח <WH3316> unto Jephthah לְכָ֕ה <WH1980> Come וְהָיִ֥יתָה <WH1961> become לָּ֖נוּ לְקָצִ֑ין <WH7101> and be our captain וְנִֽלָּחֲמָ֖ה <WH3898> that we may fight בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> with the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> And Jephthah לְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> unto the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you שְׂנֵאתֶ֣ם <WH8130> Did not ye hate אוֹתִ֔י <WH853> וַתְּגָרְשׁ֖וּנִי <WH1644> me and expel מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> court אָבִ֑י <WH1> me out of my father's וּמַדּ֜וּעַ <WH4069> have you בָּאתֶ֤ם <WH935> come אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me עַ֔תָּה <WH6258> now כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צַ֥ר <WH6862> adversary לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> said זִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> And the elders גִלְעָ֜ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> to יִפְתָּ֗ח <WH3316> unto Jephthah לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> this עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> have now שַׁ֣בְנוּ <WH7725> Therefore we turn again אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you וְהָלַכְתָּ֣ <WH1980> to thee now that thou mayest go עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> us וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֖ <WH3898> with us and fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְהָיִ֤יתָ <WH1961> and become לָּ֙נוּ֙ לְרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> and be our head לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יִפְתָּ֜ח <WH3316> And Jephthah אֶל־ <WH413> to זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> unto the elders גִלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> of Gilead אִם־ <WH518> If מְשִׁיבִ֨ים <WH7725> If ye bring me home again אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> לְהִלָּחֵם֙ <WH3898> to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> against the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְנָתַ֧ן <WH5414> deliver יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> them before אָנֹכִ֕י <WH595> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> band

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said זִקְנֵֽי־ <WH2205> And the elders גִלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> of Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> to יִפְתָּ֑ח <WH3316> unto Jephthah יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> be witness בֵּֽינוֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH996> between אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> not כִדְבָרְךָ֖ <WH1697> not so according to thy words כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> between us if we do

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> Then Jephthah עִם־ <WH5973> with זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> with the elders גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <WH7760> made הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and the people אוֹת֛וֹ <WH853> עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> him head וּלְקָצִ֑ין <WH7101> and captain וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> uttered יִפְתָּ֧ח <WH3316> over them and Jephthah אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּבָרָ֛יו <WH1697> all his words לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> in Mizpeh פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יִפְתָּח֙ <WH3316> And Jephthah מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מַה־ <WH4100> What לִּ֣י וָלָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that בָ֥אתָ <WH935> What hast thou to do with me that thou art come אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> against me to fight בְּאַרְצִֽי׃ <WH776> common

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> answered מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon אֶל־ <WH413> to מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <WH4397> unto the messengers יִפְתָּ֗ח <WH3316> of Jephthah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because לָקַ֨ח <WH3947> took away יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Because Israel אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצִי֙ <WH776> my land בַּעֲלוֹת֣וֹ <WH5927> when they came up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt מֵאַרְנ֥וֹן <WH769> from Arnon וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַיַּבֹּ֖ק <WH2999> even unto Jabbok וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> and unto Jordan וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now הָשִׁ֥יבָה <WH7725> now therefore restore those [lands] again אֶתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> peaceably

וַיּ֥וֹסֶף <WH3254> again ע֖וֹד <WH5750> But יִפְתָּ֑ח <WH3316> And Jephthah וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said ל֔וֹ כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יִפְתָּ֑ח <WH3316> Jephthah לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor לָקַ֤ח <WH3947> took not away יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the land מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> nor the land בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

כִּ֖י <WH3588> for בַּעֲלוֹתָ֣ם <WH5927> came up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> from Egypt וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> But when Israel בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> through the wilderness עַד־ <WH5704> against יַם־ <WH3220> sea ס֔וּף <WH5488> unto the Red וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came קָדֵֽשָׁה׃ <WH6946> to Kadesh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Then Israel מַלְאָכִ֣ים ׀ <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> unto the king אֱד֨וֹם ׀ <WH123> of Edom לֵאמֹ֜ר <WH559> saying אֶעְבְּרָה־ <WH5674> Let me I pray thee pass through נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <WH776> thy land וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not שָׁמַע֙ <WH8085> would not hearken מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> but the king אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> also אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king מוֹאָ֛ב <WH4124> of Moab שָׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> [thereto] And in like manner they sent וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אָבָ֑ה <WH14> but he would וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> abode יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> not [consent] and Israel בְּקָדֵֽשׁ׃ <WH6946> in Kadesh

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> through the wilderness וַיָּ֜סָב <WH5437> and compassed אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> the land אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> of Edom וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the land מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> and came מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> east side שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> east side לְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּן <WH2583> and pitched בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> on the other side אַרְנ֑וֹן <WH769> of Arnon וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> but came בִּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> not within the border מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַרְנ֖וֹן <WH769> for Arnon גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> [was] the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to סִיח֥וֹן <WH5511> unto Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and Israel נַעְבְּרָה־ <WH5674> unto him Let us pass נָּ֥א <WH4994> Please בְאַרְצְךָ֖ <WH776> we pray thee through thy land עַד־ <WH5704> into מְקוֹמִֽי׃ <WH4725> my place

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not הֶאֱמִ֨ין <WH539> trusted סִיח֤וֹן <WH5511> But Sihon אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> not Israel עֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> to pass בִּגְבֻל֔וֹ <WH1366> through his coast וַיֶּאֱסֹ֤ף <WH622> together סִיחוֹן֙ <WH5511> but Sihon אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> all his people וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּיָ֑הְצָה <WH3096> in Jahaz וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> and fought עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel

וַ֠יִּתֵּן <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> סִיח֧וֹן <WH5511> Sihon וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> and all his people בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיַּכּ֑וּם <WH5221> and they smote וַיִּירַשׁ֙ <WH3423> possessed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> them so Israel אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> all the land הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> of that country הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> they

וַיִּ֣ירְשׁ֔וּ <WH3423> And they possessed אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> all the coasts הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> of the Amorites מֵֽאַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> from Arnon וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַיַּבֹּ֔ק <WH2999> even unto Jabbok וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> and from the wilderness וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> even unto Jordan

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> now יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> So now the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel הוֹרִישׁ֙ <WH3423> hath dispossessed אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> the Amorites מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from before עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> his people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you תִּירָשֶֽׁנּוּ׃ <WH3423> and shouldest thou possess

הֲלֹ֞א <WH3808> not אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> what יוֹרִֽישְׁךָ֛ <WH3423> Wilt not thou possess כְּמ֥וֹשׁ <WH3645> that which Chemosh אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy god אוֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תִירָ֑שׁ <WH3423> giveth thee to possess וְאֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what הוֹרִ֜ישׁ <WH3423> shall drive out יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> ? So whomsoever the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <WH430> our God מִפָּנֵ֖ינוּ <WH6440> from before אוֹת֥וֹ <WH853> נִירָֽשׁ׃ <WH3423> us them will we possess
